data.message:
Please share this humble, but truthful message world-wide.
My dearly beloved fellow human being: If you are a none racist, intelligent, rational thinking human being, it is in your best interest not to embrace the racist, evil, psychopath monster, modern day Hitler who will finish the job his uncle did not finish and destroy humanity as we know it...
A vote for the racist rapist, con-artist thief, incestuous worm Donald J. Drumfp Yucks, is a vote for the end of humanity...
Don't be a bigot and do right by our planet...
